_comment: Media Gathering Agent Configuration - Default Balanced Settings
_usage: Copy to .agent-config.json in project root and modify as needed

search._comment_max_search_queries: Maximum number of search query variations to generate (reduces API calls if lowered)
search._comment_results_per_source: Number of results to request from each API source (5-20 recommended)

scoring._comment_min_final_score: Minimum final score to accept a media asset (0-100 scale). Higher = stricter quality gate
scoring._comment_style_confidence_weight: Weight for style confidence in final score (0.0-1.0). Higher = style matching more important
scoring._comment_quality_weight: Weight for quality in final score calculation (0.0-1.0)
scoring._comment_relevance_weight: Weight for relevance in final score calculation (0.0-1.0)
scoring._comment_base_relevance_score: Starting relevance score before keyword matches (0-100)
scoring._comment_base_style_confidence: Starting style confidence score when no style constraint (0.0-1.0)

quality_bonuses._comment_quality_bonus_cc0: Bonus points for CC0 license (most permissive)

relevance._comment_keyword_match_weight: Maximum points awarded for keyword matching (out of base relevance score)

style_validation._comment_styles: Style keywords for confidence-based validation. Add more styles as needed.

cartoon._comment_positive: Keywords that increase confidence this is the desired style
cartoon._comment_negative: Keywords that reduce confidence (indicates wrong style)

timeouts._comment_api_timeout: Seconds to wait for API responses (recommend 5-10)
timeouts._comment_download_timeout: Seconds to wait for file downloads (recommend 10-30)

retry._comment_max_retries: Number of retry attempts for failed API calls and downloads
retry._comment_retry_delay_base: Base delay for exponential backoff (seconds). Attempts: 1s, 2s, 4s, etc.

logging._comment_level: Log level: DEBUG (verbose), INFO (normal), WARNING (errors only), ERROR (critical only)
